an4.38:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno yani tani puthusamanabrahmananam puthupaccekasaccani, seyyathidam—
an4.38:1.4: sassato lokoti va, asassato lokoti va, antava lokoti va, anantava lokoti va, tam jivam tam sariranti va, annam jivam annam sariranti va, hoti tathagato param maranati va, na hoti tathagato param maranati va, hoti ca na ca hoti tathagato param maranati va, neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param maranati va;
an4.38:1.5: sabbani tani nunnani honti panunnani cattani vantani muttani pahinani patinissatthani.
an4.38:1.6: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu panunnapaccekasacco hoti.
an4.38:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno kamesana pahina hoti, bhavesana pahina hoti, brahmacariyesana patippassaddha.
an4.38:2.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu samavayasatthesano hoti.
an4.38:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahana dukkhassa ca pahana pubbeva somanassadomanassanam atthangama adukkhamasukham upekkhasatiparisuddhim catuttham jhanam upasampajja viharati.
an4.38:3.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu passaddhakayasankharo hoti.
an4.38:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno asmimano pahino hoti ucchinnamulo talavatthukato anabhavankato ayatim anuppadadhammo.
an4.38:4.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu patilino hoti.
an4.38:4.4: Panunnapaccekasacco, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ‘samavayasatthesano passaddhakayasankharo patilino’ti vuccatiti.
